info

Class Toolkit

  • java.lang.Object
    • javax.servlet.GenericServlet
      • javax.servlet.http.HttpServlet
        • info.Toolkit
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ToolkitConstants, java.io.Serializable, javax.servlet.Servlet, javax.servlet.ServletConfig

    public class Toolkit
extends javax.servlet.http.HttpServlet
implements ToolkitConstants
    The Toolkit class provides access to the toolkit properties and also provides operations used by all the tools.
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

      • init

        public void init(javax.servlet.ServletConfig config)
          throws javax.servlet.ServletException
        Handle the INIT operation. This operation is invoked by the servlet engine when it starts up. Set the tookit properties if they have not already been set. This includes the proposal data path.
        Specified by:
        init in interface javax.servlet.Servlet
        Overrides:
        init in class javax.servlet.GenericServlet
        Parameters:
        config - The configuration object established by the servlet engine.
        Throws:
        javax.servlet.ServletException

      • buildWarningsScript

        public static java.lang.String buildWarningsScript(java.lang.String reasons)
        Build and return a JavaScript program which will popup an alert box detailing the reasons that the input is in error.
        Parameters:
        reasons - A list of field names and associated reason for the error.
        Returns:
        The JavaScript program which produces a popup detailing any input errors and the associated cause.
